mapper.select: select r.rid,r.rcontent,r.rdate,ufrom.uid fuid,ufrom.uname funame,ufrom.uportrait fuportrait,uto.uid tuid,uto.uname tuname from tb_comment c left join tb_reply r on r.cid = c.cid left join tb_user ufrom on ufrom.uid = r.fromid left join tb_user uto on uto.uid = r.toid where c.cid = #{cid}

select r.rid,r.rcontent,r.rdate,r.rread,r.cid,f.ftitle,u.uname,f.fid from tb_reply r left join tb_user u on r.toid = u.uid left join tb_comment c on c.cid = r.cid left join tb_forum f on f.fid = c.fid where r.fromid = #{uid} order by r.rid desc

select r.rid,r.rcontent,r.rdate,r.rread,r.cid,f.fid,f.ftitle,u.uname from tb_reply r left join tb_comment c on c.cid = r.cid left join tb_forum f on c.fid = f.fid left join tb_user u on r.fromid = u.uid where r.toid = #{uid} order by r.rid desc
select count(r.rread) rtotal from tb_reply r where r.toid = #{uid} and r.rread = 'no' group by r.rread
mapper.update: update tb_reply set rread = 'yes' where rid = #{rid}
